appetizers.name: Classic Caesar Salad
appetizers.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

appetizers.name: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizers.description: Golden-fried mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.

appetizers.name: Chicken Wings
appetizers.description: Your choice of buffalo, barbecue, or teriyaki wings, served with celery sticks and ranch dressing.

mains.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Wrap
mains.description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing in a flour tortilla.

mains.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
mains.description: Traditional Italian meat sauce served over a bed of al dente spaghetti.

mains.name: Cheeseburger
mains.description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a sesame seed bun. Served with fries.

desserts.name: Chocolate Brownie Sundae
desserts.description: Warm chocolate brownie topped with vanilla ice cream, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream.

desserts.name: New York Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

desserts.name: Fruit Sorbet
desserts.description: A refreshing mix of seasonal fruit sorbet.
